txt.en: You have found a grieving man hiding in the ruins
You have escorted Wadel to safety
While searching Thornhope for survivors, you discovered a man aggrieved by the loss of his family.
'I think I can make it from here!'
While searching Thornhope for survivors, you discovered a man aggrieved by the loss of his family.\n\nYou should help the man to safety.
Wadel is hiding in the brush near the ruins of his home in Thornhope.\n\nYou should escort Wadel to safety.

'I have lost everything... why will they not kill me as well?'

You manage to convince Wadel that his family would wish him to live and that he should seek safety when you next distract the Orcs.

'I-I will do so... I-I will live, if only to have my revenge upon the beasts.'
Wadel is hiding in the brush near the ruins of his home in Thornhope.\n\nYou should escort Wadel to safety.
Wadel is at Béortnoth's camp, outside of Thornhope.\n\nYou should speak with Wadel when you return to Béortnoth's camp.
'I should thank you, stranger, for by living I may be avenged for the deaths of my family.'
Talk to Wadel at Béortnoth's camp
